description: After Israeli forces pulled out of Gaza City’s vast al-Shifa hospital complex on April 1, following their second raid there, stunned Palestinians who pored over the burnt-out ruins said it reeked of death, the BBC reported.
title: Palestinians recount horrific conditions at Al-Shifa hospital

description: If war continues unabated, more than one million Palestinians in Gaza could suffer the highest level of starvation by mid-July, according to a report by the UN’s World Health Organization (WHO) and Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO).
title: UN warns of highest level of starvation in Gaza

description: Lebanon’s Hezbollah resistance movement has carried out a fresh attack against Israeli military bases.
title: Hezbollah attacks Israeli soldiers

description: Israel organized and paid for an influence campaign last year targeting US lawmakers and the American public with pro-Israel messaging, as it aimed to foster support for its actions in the war with Gaza, according to officials involved in the effort and documents related to the operation, the New York Times reported.
title: NYT: Israel organized campaign to influence US lawmakers

description: Israel’s widespread use of white phosphorus in south Lebanon is putting civilians at grave risk and contributing to civilian displacement, Human Rights Watch warned.
title: HRW: Israel’s use of white phosphorous endangers Lebanese civilians

description: Slovenia’s parliament on Tuesday approved the recognition of an independent Palestinian state, rejecting a proposal to call a referendum.
title: Recognition of Palestinian state gains momentum

description: TEHRAN - Former Pakistani Minister of Information and Broadcasting Fawad Ahmed Hussain Chaudhry has called on Western countries to end their double standard regarding Pakistan's cooperation with Iran, particularly on a joint gas pipeline project between the two neighbors.
title: Ex-Pakistani Minister urges West to end double standard on Iran-Pakistan cooperation

description: TEHRAN – Iran's ambassador to Saudi Arabia has highlighted the significant strides made in fostering cooperation among the eight littoral states of the Persian Gulf.
title: Iranian envoy highlights steps toward collective cooperation among Persian Gulf states

description: MADRID- Ayatollah Seyyed Ali Khamenei, the Leader of the Islamic Revolution, wrote an open letter on May 30th to American students protesting against the Zionist genocide in Gaza, affirming they are "on the right side of history."
title: Leader’s letter highlighted the ugly face of Western hegemony system

description: MADRID- On the 35th anniversary of the passing of Imam Khomeini, the architect of the Islamic Revolution, his figure remains crucial not only to understanding the current political landscape of the Islamic Republic but also to comprehending the general discourse in the Muslim world.
title: Imam Khomeini: the distinct legacy of a Muslim leader

description: TEHRAN – The acting Foreign Minister of Iran has called on Western nations to support the preservation of the International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA) as a purely technical organization and to refrain from exploiting the UN agency for their own political agendas.
title: Countries should not capitalize on IAEA for political purposes: acting FM

description: TEHRAN – Kazem Gharibabadi, the Deputy Chief for International Affairs of the Iranian Judiciary and Secretary General of Iran's High Council for Human Rights, has demanded that France release an Iranian citizen detained by French authorities for expressing support for Palestinians.
title: Iranian official calls on France to release pro-Palestinian citizen

description: TEHRAN- An adaptation of Russian filmmaker Andrei Konchalovsky’s 2002 movie “House of Fools” will go on stage at a Tehran theater hall in Summer.
title: Adaptation of Andrei Konchalovsky’s “House of Fools” to go on stage in Tehran

description: TEHRAN- The first concert of Iran’s National Orchestra in the current Iranian year (started in March) will be held at Tehran’s Vahdat Hall, featuring renowned vocalist Abdolhossein Mokhtabad.
title: Iran's National Orchestra to perform with vocalist Abdolhossein Mokhtabad

description: TEHRAN – Iranian Foreign Ministry spokesman Nasser Kanaani has issued a stern condemnation, stating that shame and scandal will permanently stain the reputations of those who support or remain silent about the Zionist regime’s crimes.
title: Iran says supporters of Israel will carry mark of ‘shame, disgrace’

description: TEHRAN- The Commander of the Quds Force of the Islamic Revolution Guard Corps on Wednesday, highlighted Resistance groups' important role in regional affairs, noting that Resistance forces have now turned into independent and decision-making entities.
title: Resistance forces now decision-makers in West Asia: Quds commander

description: TEHRAN – The commander of Iran's Islamic Revolution Guards Corps (IRGC), Major General Hossein Salami, has vowed revenge against Israel for the killing of an IRGC military adviser in a recent airstrike on Syria's Aleppo.
title: Iran vows retaliation against Israel for assassination of advisor in Syria

description: TEHRAN - The wise letter from the Leader of Islamic Revolution Ayatollah Seyyed Ali Khamenei to freedom-loving and conscientious students in American universities who support the Palestinian people follows the path previously established by the founder of the Islamic Revolution, Imam Khomeini.
title: Emergence of Resistance axis within American universities

description: TEHRAN — With the registration period for candidates having concluded on Monday, Iran is gearing up for the 14th presidential election.
title: June 28 election: candidates await Constitutional Council's verdict

description: TEHRAN - A senior Hamas leader, Osama Hamdan, has emphasized that the Israeli occupation regime will not see its captives held in Gaza except through a serious and genuine deal in which Palestinian prisoners enjoy their freedom.
title: Hamas: "We conveyed our position to mediators"

description: TEHRAN - Continuing unconditional support for Israel came to light in the US House of Representatives on Tuesday as the lower chamber of Congress passed a bill that would impose sanctions on the International Criminal Court (ICC) due to its efforts to prosecute Israeli criminals.
title: US hypocrisy on democracy

description: TEHRAN - After hopes went up for a potential breakthrough in relations between Iran and the International Atomic Energy Agency, IAEA Director General Rafael Grossi along with the European trio stunned observers with remarks and actions indicative of plans to turn the screw on Iran.
title: Election game with nuclear card

description: TEHRAN - The US House of Representatives on Tuesday started a war against international law by voting in favor of a bill that would sanction the International Criminal Court for seeking arrest warrants against Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and his war minister Yoav Gallant.
title: US House launches war against international law

description: TEHRAN-The 8th Ramsgate International Film Festival, due to be held from June 25 to 30 in the UK, has selected several Iranian films and series to show in various sections.
title: Ramsgate International Film Festival picks 5 Iranian films, series

description: TEHRAN-Iranian veteran illustrator and painter Hadi Jamali, who was recently hospitalized due to an illness, passed away on Tuesday night at the age of 74.
title: Veteran painter Hadi Jamali passes away

description: TEHRAN - In a remarkable surge of cultural interest, West Azarbaijan’s museums have attracted more than 50,000 visitors, throughout the very first two months of the current Persian year (started on March 20).
title: West Azarbaijan museums welcome 50k visitors in two months

description: TEHRAN – On the verge of Handicrafts Week, Iran gears up to celebrate artisanal traditions and economic growth with a great number of projects set for unveiling on World Handicrafts Day.
title: Iran to celebrate Handicrafts Week with special programs

description: TEHRAN - IRAN has approved a six-month extension for “The glory of the ancient Persia: Exhibition of Iranian cultural relics”, following an enthusiastic reception in China.
title: “Glory of Persia” illuminates China for six more months

description: UZBEKISTAN, Samarkand - During a recent visit to Samarkand, I explored  a number of historical gems​, including Registan Square, Shah-i-Zinda, and the Mausoleum of Amir Timur, to name a few.
title: Discovering Samarkand: Mausoleum of Amir Timur through the eyes of foreign tourists

description: TEHRAN – Iran national football team head coach Amir Ghalenoei is going to field experienced and younger players against Hong Kong.
title: Ghalenoei confirms plan to mix ‘experienced with younger players’

description: TEHRAN - Iran's boxing team will not have a representative at the Paris Olympics for the first time in eight consecutive appearances after all seven boxers were eliminated from the Olympic qualifying tournament in Thailand.
title: Expert hits out at Iran’s boxing for failing to clinch Olympics’ spot

description: TEHRAN - The Italian embassy in Tehran celebrated Republic Day (Festa della Repubblica) on June 2 at the embassy’s historic residence in northern Tehran.
title: Italian embassy in Tehran celebrates Republic Day

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s three-time Paralympics champion Zahra Nemati will be absent in the 2024 Paralympic Games.
title: Zahra Nemati misses 2024 Paralympic Games

description: TEHRAN – The National Institute for Oceanography and Atmospheric Science plans to observe World Ocean Day on June 8th under the slogan of "Awakening the deep spirit of cooperation and commitment in the field of marine and oceanic sciences", an official with the Institute has said.
title: Awakening deep spirit of cooperation, commitment in marine, oceanic sciences

description: TEHRAN –Iran's Physics Olympiad team is participating in the 24th Asian Physics Olympiad (APho), in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
title: Iranian students attending APho 2024

description: TEHRAN –World Environment Day, held annually on June 5, is the largest global event for raising awareness and taking action to protect the planet Earth.
title: Striving for global consensus on addressing SDSs

description: TEHRAN –Iran’s deputy permanent representative to the UN office in Geneva, Mehdi Aliabadi, has been elected as the chairman of the General Affairs Committee of the 112th session of the International Labor Conference (ILC).
title: Iran chairing ILC’s General Affairs Committee

description: Famous Russian and foreign musicians will perform at the Iyun'skoe sozvuchie concert (June Consonance) within the X International Tchaikovsky Festival of Arts, which will be held in Moscow and Klin from 21 to 30 June.
title: Laureates of major international music competitions to take part in Iyun'skoe sozvuchie concert

description: More than 4,000 foreign participants from 97 countries are expected at the BRICS Games in Kazan, Deputy Prime Minister Dmitry Chernyshenko said following a meeting of the organising committee for the preparation and holding of the BRICS Games. This is reported by the official website of the Russian Government.
title: More than 90 countries confirm their participation in BRICS Games

description: TEHRAN - In their quest for perfection, and to counter the integration of increasingly tall players into their opponents' line-up, the Iranian team can count on a major asset.
title: Mehrzad fatal weapon of Iran sitting volleyball in Paris

description: TEHRAN – Iran, in association with the Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (FAO), is scheduled to hold talks on turning the country into a hub for food security in the West Asia region, an Iranian official said.
title: Iran to collaborate with FAO to become hub for regional food security

description: TEHRAN - Russia's Deputy Prime Minister Alexey Overchuk says Moscow would welcome Iran joining the Eurasian Economic Union (EAEU) as an observer member, which he said could happen by the end of 2024.
title: Russia welcomes Iran's request to join EAEU

description: TEHRAN – The heads of the chambers of commerce of Iran and Jordan have highlighted the significance of exchanging trade delegations so that businesspeople from both countries will get familiar with the potentials of each other.
title: Iran, Jordan private sectors to exchange business delegations

description: BEIJING-  A number of journalists from some Asian, African and Pacific countries visited China Oriental Performing Arts Group on Tuesday (June 4).
title: China Oriental Performing Arts Group welcomes foreign media with great performances

description: TEHRAN - The value of Iran’s non-oil exports to Pakistan in the first four months of 2024 has reached $360 million, showing an 18 percent growth compared to last year’s corresponding period.
title: Exports to Pakistan up 18% in 4 months y/y

description: TEHRAN - Iran exported $1.2 billion worth of non-oil products to the African countries during the first two years of late Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi’s term, an official said.
title: Iran’s non-oil exports to Africa hit $1.2b in 2 years

description: TEHRAN - Iran’s deputy minister of roads said India has agreed to allocate $1 billion to the project on the development of Iran’s southeastern Chabahar Port.
title: India to earmark $1b for development of Iran’s Chabahar
